version_note: Commonly used mappings; plant/vendor-specific variants may exist.

systems.name: Reactor Coolant
systems.description: Primary reactor coolant loop (PWR): reactor vessel, hot/cold legs, reactor coolant pumps.

systems.name: Reactor Coolant System (alt)
systems.description: Alternate label of RC used in some records.

systems.name: Chemical and Volume Control
systems.description: Boration/dilution, letdown, charging; maintains chemistry and inventory in the primary system.

systems.name: Steam Generator
systems.description: Heat exchangers transferring heat from primary to secondary (PWR).

systems.name: Main Feedwater
systems.description: Supplies condensate/feedwater to steam generators (PWR) or reactor vessel (BWR via recirc path).

systems.name: Feedwater Control
systems.description: Control and protection for feedwater/condensate train; sometimes used broadly as 'Feedwater & Condensate'.

systems.name: Main Steam
systems.description: Steam headers from SGs/turbine stop valves; includes main steam isolation valves.

systems.name: Auxiliary Feedwater
systems.description: Safety-related backup feedwater supply to steam generators.

systems.name: Emergency Core Cooling
systems.description: ECCS umbrella for HPI/LPI/SI/CS/RHR depending on plant design.

systems.name: Safety Injection
systems.description: High-pressure emergency borated water injection to the reactor (PWR).

systems.name: Residual Heat Removal
systems.description: Low-temperature decay heat removal; shutdown cooling.

systems.name: Containment Spray
systems.description: Spray system for pressure/iodine control within containment during accidents.

systems.name: Containment Ventilation
systems.description: Ventilation/filtration within containment; sometimes overlaps with HVAC codes.

systems.name: Primary Containment
systems.description: Primary containment boundary/functions (terminology more common on BWRs).

systems.name: Component Cooling Water
systems.description: Closed-loop cooling for heat exchangers, pumps, and I&C racks.

systems.name: Service Water
systems.description: Ultimate heat sink side (lake/river/sea) supplying heat exchangers.

systems.name: Heating, Ventilation & Air Conditioning
systems.description: Plant HVAC including safety-related air handling units and filtration.

systems.name: AC Electrical Distribution
systems.description: Medium/low-voltage AC buses, switchgear, inverters and related protection.

systems.name: DC Electrical Distribution
systems.description: Station batteries, DC panels, chargers; supports protection and controls.

systems.name: Battery System
systems.description: Battery banks providing DC power for safety and control systems.

systems.name: Diesel Generator
systems.description: Emergency AC power supply; includes support systems (fuel, cooling, start air).

systems.name: Transformers
systems.description: Generator step-up, unit auxiliary, station service transformers and protection.

systems.name: Radiation Monitoring
systems.description: Area/process radiation monitors, post-accident monitors.

systems.name: Neutron Instrumentation
systems.description: Source/intermediate/power range detectors and associated channels.

systems.name: Radwaste
systems.description: Liquid, gaseous, and solid radwaste processing subsystems.
